data.text: @OmarAlghabra @MaritimeBus1 @KodyBloisNS Maritime bus isn't affordable transportation.  They could be running a regular service I  places like Halifax to the outer communities of Enfield and elmsdale to help ease traffic heading inbound and outbound.  We need better transportation in Atlantic Canada
@OmarAlghabra @MaritimeBus1 @KodyBloisNS The only challenge you all have is to figure out how to promote your #CovidLies.

@OmarAlghabra @MaritimeBus1 @KodyBloisNS Engaging will make you and your government stronger. You’ll be confronted and you will learn or teach. It’s a win win. Hope you do much more of it and establish this as a norm of behavior.

@OmarAlghabra @MaritimeBus1 @KodyBloisNS What about challenges still faced by border families?  Still waiting for you to explain risk of your travel compared to short border trips. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @Irek_K @manvirshokar @CPHO_Canada @JustinTrudeau @GovCanHealth
@OmarAlghabra @MaritimeBus1 @KodyBloisNS Resign you corrupt little shit stain
